headline: The Case for and Against Removing Trump
abstract: A detailed look at excerpts from the articles of impeachment and how the parties diverge on the facts at the center of President Trump’s trial.
lead_paragraph: A detailed look at excerpts from the articles of impeachment and how the parties diverge on the facts at the center of President Trump’s trial.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
